title: Does this change make a difference? - NZXT H5 Flow
description: Thanks NZXT for sponsoring today's video! Check out NZXT's H5 Flow case as well as some of the parts used below: Buy an NZXT H5 Flow at:   Buy an NZXT Vertical GPU Mounting Kit:  Buy an NZXT F120 Fan:  Buy an NZXT T120 Cooler:  Buy an Intel Core i5 12600K CPU:  Buy an NZXT Kraken Z63 Cooler:  Buy an NZXT Puck:  Buy NZXT Lift Mouse:  Buy a Crucial 1TB NVMe SSD:  Buy an NZXT Signal 4k30 Capture Card:  Buy a 32GB kit of Crucial Ballistix DDR4 RAM:  Buy NZXT Thermal Paste:  Check out the PALiT Game Rock RTX 3070:   Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something? Make a suggestion at    SUBSCRIBE ON FLOATPLANE:    GET MERCH:   AFFILIATES, SPONSORS & REFERRALS:   PODCAST GEAR:   SUPPORT US ON FLOATPLANE:   FOLLOW US ELSEWHERE ---------------------------------------------------   Twitter:  Instagram:  TikTok:  Facebook:   CHAPTERS --------------------------------------------------- 0:00 Who's NZXT? 0:34 Some key differences 1:34 Let's build a computer! 2:08 Motherboard 4:12 Where's the power supply? 4:54 GPU 8:42 The grand unveiling 10:36 Let's boot 'er up!
